version_description:
​Thanks for using Shopee! We’ve updated:
+ Product Variations: Save time by selecting variations (like size, colour) for a product during check-out.
+ Active Sellers: In a hurry to get your product? Buy from recently active sellers with a high chat response rate.
+ Read All: We heard you! Now you can clear your Actions Required and Activity at one go.
+ Improved Discovery: Enhancements for Search and Trending Hashtags.

Even more for sellers:
+ Revamped My Income: Now even easier to see when you’ll receive your payments.
+ Seller Auto-Reply: Answer FAQs by setting an auto-reply for your shop.
+ Promote your Product: Tap a button to push your product to the top.
+ Better Image Cropping: No more worries of cropping out crucial parts of your image.

If you like the app, please consider taking a moment to leave a review. Thanks! ​
Bug Fixes

Thanks for using Shopee! We’ve updated:

+ Optimized Chat: We've revamped Chat to organize it by users, instead of products, to make communication even more convenient. Now you can also search within chats, delete old chats, and more.
+ Improved Notifications: We've sorted notifications into different groups for easier viewing. You can also select which notifications you want to receive.
+ Easier Browsing: Quickly find what you want with additional sort and filter options.
+ Sharing is caring: If you love it, share it! Spread the word on Facebook and Messenger with just a tap.
+ Better Rating System: 5 stars or just 4 stars? Give more precise feedback on how much you like your purchase.

We've also removed annoying bugs to make your shopping experience even better. If you’ve enjoyed shopping on Shopee, please leave us a review. Thanks!

Thanks for using Shopee! We’ve updated:

+ Youtube video support: Sellers, engage your customers with a Youtube video, directly on your Shopee profile.
+ Add to Cart: Shop, compare and buy several products at one go easily with the new add to cart function. Also, access your cart easily from more pages!
+ Bug fixes and other performance enhancements.

If you’ve enjoyed shopping on Shopee, please leave us a review, thanks!

Thanks for using Shopee! We’ve updated:

+ Redesigned Shop: Explore new arrivals, what's on sale and collections within your favourite shops. Also, you can now search within shops.
+ Recommended Sellers: Discover more shops to visit, from your Home feed.
+ More detailed Shopee categories: Find what you want with more detailed categories.
+ Bug fixes and other performance enhancements.

If you’ve enjoyed shopping on Shopee, please leave a review, thanks!

Thanks for using Shopee! We’ve added two ways to make Shopee a more comfortable and fairer marketplace for you.

+ Block buyers: Define the users you want to sell to. Block specific buyers from buying and chatting with you.
+ Dispute rating: Received an inappropriate or unfair rating? You can now dispute it.

We’ve also improved our performance to make your shopping experience even better. If you’ve enjoyed shopping on Shopee, please leave us a review. Thanks!
